select carriers.code, carriers.name, carriers.simple_name, owners.owner_name, carriers.remark, carriers.create_time, user1.real_name create_user, user2.real_name update_user, carriers.update_time, (CASE when carriers.status=1 Then '启用' Else '未启用' End) status from basics_carriers carriers LEFT JOIN blade_user user1 ON user1.id = carriers.create_user LEFT JOIN blade_user user2 ON user2.id = carriers.update_user LEFT JOIN wms_owner owners on owners.wo_id=carriers.wo_id
AND carriers.is_deleted = '0'
AND carriers.code LIKE concat('%',#{query.code},'%')
AND carriers.name LIKE concat('%',#{query.name},'%')
AND carriers.simple_name LIKE concat('%',#{query.simpleName},'%')
